contents.text: Welcome to Birst, an Infor company in San Francisco, where we deliver smart, connected, and scalable networked business analytics.
For sales and inquiries about our networked analytics platform, press 1.
For a live demonstration or product tour of the Birst platform, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our sales team for a demonstration.

navigationGoals: I'd like to arrange a live demonstration of the Birst analytics platform.
I’d like a live demonstration of the Birst analytics platform to see how it could support our veteran outreach operations.
I’d like to schedule a live walkthrough of Birst’s networked analytics architecture and API integration.
I’m not comfortable with new software. Could someone walk me through a live demo of your analytics platform step by step?
I’d like to schedule a walkthrough of the Birst platform to see how I can analyze my lab data

contents.text: For pricing, licensing, and billing information, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our billing department.

navigationGoals: I need to review pricing and billing options for our Birst subscription.
I need detailed information on pricing and licensing so I can budget for our veteran support program’s analytics tools.
I need details on the enterprise subscription licensing tiers, pricing structure, and billing cycle.
I need simple details on how much your service costs, what the plans include, and how I can pay my bill.
I need details on student and academic pricing plans for Birst licenses

contents.text: For customer support and technical assistance, press 2.
For technical support and troubleshooting assistance, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a technical support specialist.

navigationGoals: I'm experiencing an error with my Birst dashboard and need technical support.
I’m experiencing errors in my analytics dashboard and need technical troubleshooting help.
I’m seeing data connector errors in my ETL pipeline and need help troubleshooting the cloud warehouse integration.
I can’t log into my account and need help resetting my password or troubleshooting access.
I’m encountering an error when linking my research database—can you help troubleshoot?

contents.text: For training resources and documentation, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our training and documentation team.

navigationGoals: I want to access training resources and documentation for the Birst platform.
I want access to training resources and documentation to get my team up to speed on using Birst effectively.
I want access to the advanced developer documentation and training modules on network data modeling in Birst.
I’d like easy-to-follow guides or tutorials to help me learn how to use your analytics tool.
I want to access tutorials or user guides for building analytic reports
